scripts.expo-publish: cd expo-updates-client && expo export --experimental-bundle && cd ../expo-updates-server && rm -rf updates/1/ && cp -r expo-updates-client/dist/ updates/1
scripts.expo-publish-test: cd expo-updates-client && expo export --experimental-bundle && cd ../expo-updates-server && rm -rf updates/test/ && cp -r expo-updates-client/dist/ updates/test
